divs: Sighting Detailsi went for a quick ride around the corner from my apartment complex and i went up this street that had a golf corse on it when i got to the last house before the golf corse a fire ball (that was as low as when u see a plane flying really low that you can see every detail of the plane) caught my attention out of the corner of my eye.. it was hovering over the house and just stayed there i was with my friend matt and he was like pull over in front off the house and lets see what it is... so i pulled over and we just sat there and watched it not move for like 2 min..not up or down or left and right just sat there... so i said hey im gunna turn the car around and pull on the other side of the street so we can see it better... so in the time it took me to pull the car around witch was like a min tops it was all the way across the sky and now the size of a star then it just dissapered.. i know that that was it because it was a verydark nite and there were no stars in the sky that was the only thing in the sky at that time.. so dumpfounded i decieded to head back to my apartment.. when i got to the bottom of the same road i was on witch took me about 2 min after it had vanished.. therer it was again just as low in the sky just as bright this big fire ball looking thing with a red dot in the middle just right above my car and it stayed above my care for like 2 min as i drove up to my parkin spot at my complex.. me and matt quickly jumped out of the car and there it was just sitting there right above us and then it jumped to the middle of the sky in amatter of a second and then in another second jumped even further back to the size of the star again then there was a little flash and it was gone agian.. we waited out side for like 15 min waiting to see if we could see it again and nothing... it was out of this world.. i have never seen anything thing like this before.. i only wish ihad my camera!
